# BadgePositions

**Static Property**

A static property that allows you to access the Look Around ready state enumeration.

## Declaration

```swift
static BadgePositions: typeof LookAroundBadgePosition;
```

## Discussion

Use this object to access the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/LookAroundBadgePosition] enumeration with `mapkit.LookAroundPreview.BadgePositions`.

## Static properties

- **ReadyStates**: A static property that allows you to access to access the look around ready state enumeration.
